timeline.author: ajsutton

timeline.bodyText: This already exists as countSetBits.  Renaming it probably makes sense.
timeline.author: ajsutton

timeline.bodyText: nit: Would be good to use an Optional here rather than a null check.
timeline.author: ajsutton

timeline.bodyText: A fixed sleep time here is likely to cause us grief in CI.  Is it possible to test this with StubAsyncRunner so we can control exactly when future tasks execute?
timeline.author: ajsutton

replies.bodyText: Changed it in a bit another way: 76158c8
replies.author: Nashatyrev
